summary: This is a Federal Bureau of Prisons TRUVIEW Inmate Center Report for inmate registration number 76318054, dated August 11, 2019. It shows a summary of financial transactions, communications, and visitation data for the inmate from January 1, 2017, to August 13, 2019, including three Western Union money transfers received in July and August 2019.

events.title: Western Union Money Transfer Received
events.description: A $200.00 Western Union money transfer was received by the inmate.

keyFacts: The document is a Bureau of Prisons inmate report for registration number 76318054, dated August 11, 2019.
The report covers activity from January 1, 2017, to August 13, 2019, and shows zero emails, messages, contacts, visitors, addresses, visits, or phone calls listed.
Three Western Union money transfers were received by the inmate in July and August 2019, totaling $700, with senders' names and addresses redacted (shown as â€¢).
The report's location field lists 'Pita, NY' as a possible origin for the transactions, though this may be an abbreviation or data entry artifact.
The inmate's financial activity appears limited to these three money transfers during the reported period, with no other recorded communications or visits.
